titles: The blessed advantages of peace and peace-makers In a sermon preach'd at the Savoy in London upon the fifth of St. Matthew; Ver. IX. Blessed are the peace-makers, for they shall be called the children of God. By Anthony Horneck, D.D. late preacher at the Savoy.
author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.
publisher: printed for B. Aylmer at the Three Pigeons against the Royal Exchange in Cornhill,
notes: At foot of title page: Price six pence.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bible. --  N.T. --  Matthew V, 9 --  Sermons --  Early works to 1800.
